item.title: CGRateS Tutorial Series- Installation – Mongo DB Server Install – Debian 8 – Part 1
item.description: Below are the steps to prepare a stand alone mongodb server for cgrates on Debian 8 jessie Install sudo 1 # apt-get install sudo Import key 1 # apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv 0C49F3730359A14518585931BC711F9BA15703C6 Add repository URL 1 # echo "deb http://repo.mongodb.org/apt/debian jessie/mongodb-org/3.4 main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-3.4.list Update and Install 1 2 3 # apt-get update # apt-get install -y mongodb-org Enable and Start

item.title: Howto :: LAMP Stack on Centos 7
item.description: Quick and Dirty install below! Install HTTPD Start and Enable Boot-Startup of httpd Install & Start / Boot-Start MariaDB ( A drop-in mysql replacement ) Secure Your MySQL Installation Add PHP & Mysql Support – Restart HTTPD Optional Package Install – You can add PHP Extensions by using the ‘yum search’ command to find and ‘yum install’ to install. Finally , Open up ports on FirewallD Optional – mcrypt and imagemagick support

item.title: Asterisk Config for PTCL SmartLink App
item.description: PTCL has recently launched an app called “SmartLink” , Which provides you access to your phone line over SIP , essentially providing landline access from anywhere. Since the land-line I have is only used for DSL and SmartTV, I wanted to set it up on SIP , so I can access it from any device. PTCL uses Huawei SoftX 3000 Soft Switches for this service , I have had experience on these switches from my previous jobs and I know that it requires PRACK support to start off , In addition , while configuring , I noticed that the user_agent also needs to be set to a certain value for the registration to be successful.
